summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3766 for the improvement of 41st Avenue Southwest, from West Brandon Street to West Hudson Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by grading and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 46356, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
